mdRecord.dcterms:description: Founded 1552 as a "charity school" for the education of children from humble backgrounds at Newgate, London. Additional establishment at Hertford from 1707. New school for boys at Horsham constructed 1893-1902; Hertford buildings now girls' school. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christ's_Hospital#History [work]
